com.atc.simulator.display

Interface DisplayCameraListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AircraftDotModel, AircraftInfoModel, BreadCrumbModel, Display.DelayedCameraListener, HudModel

    public interface DisplayCameraListener
    Listener interface for classes wishing to listen to updates provided by the display's camera.
